description:
Lightweight shoes for fast-paced mountain adventures. The lightweight air mesh upper has Kevlar® cable wrapping for added stability and a heel cup that holds your foot securely on uneven terrain. Aggressive lugs provide reliable traction in alpine environments.

  • Breathable air mesh upper uses a seamless construction
  • Stretch gaiter over the tongue keeps out trail debris
  • Salewa 3F System connects the instep with the sole and heel for a supportive, flexible fit
  • Removable OrthoLite® footbed adds comfort
  • Performance EVA midsole cushions and supports feet over tricky ground
  • Pomoca® outsole with S-Path technology grips wet or dry surfaces
name: Salewa MS Dropline Light Trail Shoes - Men's
